short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect emails on the screen, validate their authenticity with our api and present to the user the result.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Validate your prospect's emails instantly

This app detects emails on the presented website, it then presents the user with a clickable button to 'validate' these emails, we use an api call to our server, sending the email and getting a result, according to that we would then present the status of the email next to it instead of the button: "invalid" "valid" or "catch-all"
